page.title: 11Ferreting around Dulverton
page.content: This is a local sport and you need to have two good{ferrets.}If we are planning to net the{rabbits}we lay down the nets round the burrows and slip the ferret into the hole.Instead of nets we sometimes use guns and shoot the rabbits. Usually the rabbits bolt out but sometimes the ferret gets laid up. This means it has caught a rabbit inside the burrow and may be there for two hours or more. We send another ferret down wearing a bleeper and when it finds the other ferret you can hear how far down they are. Then you can dig them out.
